remarks: Lemma for ~ basel .  The function ` F ` of partial sums of the inverse squares is bounded below by ` J ` and above by ` K ` , obtained by summing the inequality ` cot ^ 2 x <_ 1 / x ^ 2 <_ ` ` csc ^ 2 x = cot ^ 2 x + 1 ` over the ` M ` roots of the polynomial ` P ` , and applying the identity ~ basellem5 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jul-2014.)
